snippet.title: Disgaea®3: Absence of Detention Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a field trip any time you want with Mao, Raspberyl, Almaz, and the rest of the Evil Academy gang when Disgaea 3 returns on the PlayStation Vita! Feel the cool breeze blow through your hair as you Magichange while sitting at the top of a hill, looking down on the beautiful city below. Featuring 5 new chapters, there's even more school life fun to be had!

http://disgaea.us/dis3vita/
